entry.title: Arkham Birds
entry.summary:
Author: Herdslittlefictions

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 137,805Chapters: 28/28Kudos: 909

Summary: Arkham Asylum has Seven inmates that should not be there.when Batman finds out he is horrified.When they meet batman they decide to make themselves everyone else's problem.Dr. Hugo strange is up to something and its not good.Aka Batkids + Stephan didn't meet Bruce Wayne until later. but they all met each other. in Arkham.
